name: Ingots
description:
Your job is to process lumps of ore into ingots. To do this, you need to first crush the ore rocks with a hammer, sweep out the rubble with a broom and heat up the useful ore into ingots with a flame.

Select a tool from the top: hammer, broom or flame, then click the ore to process it. Each type of ore needs to be processed a different number of times with each tool.

You gain score when ingots reach the end of the belt. For every 3 delivered ingots a new type of ore unlocks, the recipe unlocks when you successfully make and deliver an ingot made from it.
